description.japanese: 貨物を合計100000回輸送する

description.english: Upgrade one of your planets to level 40
description.german: Werte einen deiner Planeten auf Stufe 40 auf.
description.french: Améliorer une de vos planètes au niveau 40
description.italian: Migliora uno dei tuoi pianeti fino al livello 40
description.spanish: Mejora uno de tus planetas al nivel 40.
description.russian: Улучшите одну из ваших планет до уровня 40
description.japanese: 惑星をレベル40までアップグレードする
description.brazilian: Melhore um dos seus planetas para o nível 40.
description.schinese: 升级您的一颗星球至等级40

displayName.japanese: イエロースター探検家

description.english: Reveal 36 sectors in your home star
description.german: Decke 36 Sektoren in deinem Heimatsystem auf.
description.french: Révéler 36 secteurs dans votre étoile principale
description.italian: Svela 36 settori nella tua stella base
description.spanish: Descubre 36 sectores en tu estrella natal.
description.russian: Откройте несколько секторов (36 шт.) в родной системе
description.japanese: 母恒星系で36セクターを開放する
description.brazilian: Revele 36 setores do seu sistema de origem.
description.schinese: 在您的母星系中揭示36个星区

description.french: Augmenter la taille de votre flotte à 14
description.italian: Aumenta la dimensione della flotta fino a 14
description.spanish: Aumenta el tamaño de tu flota a 14.
description.japanese: 艦隊規模を14まで増加させる
description.brazilian: Aumente o tamanho de sua frota para 14.

description.french: Récupérer 10000000 d'hydrogène dans les ceintures d'astéroïdes
description.italian: Raccogli 10000000 di idrogeno dai campi di asteroidi
description.spanish: Recoge 10000000 de hidrógeno en los campos de asteroides.
description.russian: Соберите 10000000 ед. водорода в полях астероидов
description.japanese: 小惑星帯から水素を10000000回収する
description.brazilian: Colete 10000000 Hidrogênio dos campos de asteroides.
description.schinese: 从小行星带采集10000000单位氢气

displayName.japanese: アーティファクトハンター

description.japanese: アーティファクトを5000個研究する

displayName.japanese: 貨物輸送アシスタント

description.english: Pay a total of 100000000 CR in shipment rewards to other players by picking up shipments from their planets
description.german: Bezahle anderen Spielern insgesamt 100000000 CR in Form von Warenbelohnungen, indem du Waren von ihren Planeten transportierst.
description.french: Payer un total de 100000000 CR en récompense de cargaison aux autres joueurs récupérant des cargaisons d'autres planètes
description.italian: Paga ad altri giocatori un totale di 100000000 crediti in ricompense per carichi raccogliendo carichi dai loro pianeti
description.koreana: 다른 플레이어들의 행성에서 수송품을 픽업하여 그들에게 총 100000000 CR을 운송 보상으로 지불하세요.
description.spanish: Paga un total de 100000000 CR en recompensas de envíos a otros jugadores recogiendo envíos en sus planetas.
description.russian: Выдайте другим игрокам награды за доставку на общую сумму в 100000000 кр., забирая грузы с их планет
description.japanese: 他のプレーヤーの惑星にある貨物を輸送し、その合計クレジットが100000000を超える
description.brazilian: Gaste um total de 100000000 CR em recompensas de carregamentos para outros jogadores ao buscar carregamentos nos planetas deles.
description.schinese: 通过帮助其他玩家运送货物，获得总计100000000星币报酬

description.english: Maintain uninterrupted diplomatic relations with another player for 365 days
description.german: Unterhalte ohne Unterbrechung 365 Tage lang diplomatische Beziehungen zu einem anderen Spieler.
description.french: Maintenir des relations diplomatiques stables avec un autre joueur pendant 365 jours
description.italian: Mantieni relazioni diplomatiche costanti con un altro giocatore per 365 giorni
description.koreana: 365일 동안 다른 플레이어와 평화로운 외교 관계를 유지하세요.
description.spanish: Mantén relaciones diplomáticas ininterrumpidas con otro jugador durante 365 día(s).
description.russian: Поддерживайте неразрывные дипломатические отношения с другим игроком в течение 365 д.
description.japanese: 他のプレーヤーとの外交関係を365日間維持する
description.brazilian: Mantenha relações diplomáticas ininterruptas com outro jogador por 365 dias.
description.schinese: 与另一位玩家保持外交关系365天不中断

displayName.japanese: ガーディアンスレイヤー

description.english: Destroy a total of 10000 Cerberus ships
description.french: Détruire un total de 10000 vaisseaux Cerbères
description.italian: Distruggi un totale di 10000 navi Cerbero
description.spanish: Destruye un total de 10000 naves Cerbero.
description.japanese: ケルベロスの戦艦を合計10000隻破壊する
description.brazilian: Destrua um total de 10000 naves Cerberus.

displayName.japanese: クレジットタイクーン

description.english: Maintain total income of 1200000 Credits per day for 7 continuous days
description.german: Erhalte 7 aufeinanderfolgende Tage lang jeden Tag mindestens 1200000 Credits.
description.french: Maintenir un revenu total de 1200000 crédits par jour pendant 7 jours d'affilée
description.italian: Mantieni un ricavo totale di 1200000 crediti per 7 giorni consecutivi
description.koreana: 7일 연속으로 매일 총 1200000개 크레딧 수입을 유지하세요.
description.spanish: Mantén unos ingresos totales de 1200000 créditos al día durante 7 días seguidos.
description.russian: Получайте не менее 1200000 кр. ежедневно 7 дней подряд
description.japanese: 7日間連続でクレジットを1200000獲得する
description.brazilian: Mantenha uma renda total de 1200000 Créditos por dia durante 7 dias consecutivos.
description.schinese: 连续7天每天总收入保持在1200000星币以上

description.english: Maintain total income of 200000 Hydrogen per day for 7 continuous days
description.german: Sammle 7 aufeinanderfolgende Tage lang jeden Tag mindestens 200000 Wasserstoff.
description.french: Maintenir un revenu total de 200000 d'hydrogène par jour pendant 7 jours d'affilée
description.italian: Mantieni un ricavo totale di 200000 idrogeno per 7 giorni consecutivi
description.koreana: 7일 연속으로 매일 총 200000 수소 수입을 유지하세요.
description.spanish: Mantén unos ingresos totales de 200000 de hidrógeno al día durante 7 días seguidos.
description.russian: Получайте не менее 200000 ед. водорода ежедневно 7 дней подряд
description.japanese: 7日間連続で水素を200000獲得する
description.brazilian: Mantenha uma renda total de 200000 de Hidrogênio por dia durante 7 dias consecutivos.
description.schinese: 连续7天每天氢气收入量保持在200000单位以上

description.italian: Partecipa a 150 missioni su stelle bianche
description.spanish: Participa en 150 misiones de estrellas blancas.
description.russian: Участвовать в заданиях у белых звезд (150)
description.japanese: ホワイトスター・ミッションに150回参加する
description.brazilian: Participe de 150 missões em Estrelas Brancas.

description.english: Deposit 50000 Hydrogen on White Star planets
description.german: Lade 50000 Wasserstoff auf Planeten von weißen Zwergen ab
description.french: Déposez 50000 hydrogène sur les planètes étoile blanche
description.italian: Deposita 50000 idrogeno su pianeti di stelle bianche
description.spanish: Deposita 50000 de hidrógeno en planetas de estrellas blancas.
description.russian: Разместить 50000 ед. водорода на планетах у белых звезд
description.japanese: ホワイトスター周辺の惑星に、水素を50000補給する
description.brazilian: Deposite 50000 de Hidrogênio em planetas de Estrelas Brancas.
description.schinese: 在白星星球上存入50000单位氢气

description.italian: Recupera 100 cimeli per la tua corporazione
description.russian: Добыть реликвии для вашей корпорации (100 шт.)
description.japanese: コーポレーションのためにレリックを100個回収する
description.brazilian: Recupere 100 Relíquias para a sua Corporação.
description.schinese: 为您的星际集团获取100个圣物

description.english: Collect 30000000 Credits in rewards from participating in White Star missions
description.german: Erhalte 30000000 Credits als Belohnung für WZ-Missionen
description.french: Récupérez 30000000 crédits de récompense pour vos participations aux missions d'étoile blanche
description.italian: Raccogli 30000000 crediti in ricompense partecipando a missioni stelle bianche
description.koreana: 백색성단 임무 참여 보상으로 30000000 크레딧 수집
description.spanish: Recoge 30000000 créditos en recompensas por participar en misiones de estrellas blancas.
description.russian: Набрать 30000000 кр. за участие в заданиях у белых звезд
description.japanese: ホワイトスター・ミッションに参加し、その報酬として30000000クレジット獲得する
description.brazilian: Colete 30000000 Créditos em recompensas de participação em missões de Estrelas Brancas.
description.schinese: 从白星任务中获得30000000星币奖励

displayName.japanese: ブルースター・ウォーリアー

description.russian: Победите в 500 матчах у голубых звезд
description.japanese: ブルースターでの戦いに500回勝利する
